message.body: Hi Laurie! So it seems that Broadway and Off Broadway Week begins tomorrow.....are you free at any point to see like, any show at all? Haha
I just got back to New York and jet lag's made my head all wonky. I'd have to think about it more, but my schedule is clear for Monday, Friday, and Saturday
I'm really down for pretty much anything, haha
Jet lag....woof, haha. And awesome! Friday night is all clear for me, actually
That's the best night! Can we talk about this a bit later, I'm actually about to fall asleep right now
